column1: Table 2. Honduras: Statement of Operations of the Central Government
Actual             Program        Est.       Program       Proj.                      Projections
Sources: Honduran authorities, IMF staff estimates and projections.
1/ As recommended by the GFSM-2014, since 2019 debt service commissions are reported as goods and services (previously included in the interest bill).
2/ Includes debt forgiveness, accumulation, rescheduling, payment and/or forgiveness of arrears.
3/ Reflects Fund purchases by the central bank to finance the budget
4/ Offsets the HIPC/MDRI debt relief accounted as grants.
